StoreAssortment.name: StoreAssortment
StoreAssortment.description: Associate an assortment to either a store, a store group, or an account.

AccountId.description: ID of the account which the retail store is part of.

AssortmentId.description: ID of the assortment with which the store is associated.

EndDate.description: Date when the assortment stops being applicable to the store.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

RetailStoreId.description: ID of the store with which the assortment is associated.

StartDate.description: Start date of applicability of the assortment to a store, store group, or an account.
